We missed you ! Login to get started.

If you want to get access to your account, you have to follow a whole procedure.

Warning: If you have changed your name on Tie Break Tennis Academy, it may take a few minutes for the new one to appear. Thanks for understanding.
Please enter your whatsapp number if you want others to find you easily.
Sorry ! There is another account created with this whatsapp number. Please choose another number and try again.
If you want to pause your Tiebreak Tennis Academy activity, you can disable your account. If you want to permanently delete your Tiebreak Tennis Academy account, let us know.
Disabling your account is temporary. Your account will be disabled, and your name and profile picture will be removed from most of the content you have followed.
Deleting your account is permanent. When you delete your Tiebreak Tennis Academy account, you can no longer retrieve content or information that you have shared on Tiebreak Tennis Academy.
If you choose to disabled your account, your shared posts will be invisible to other members.
Your account has been successfully disabled. Note that you can reactivate it at any time.
For technical reasons, you cannot disable your account at the moment. Please try again later.
Your account has been successfully enabled.
A help part is essential to facilitate the use of the application.

We advise you to use a password on which you do not use anywhere else.
The authentication log contains the information necessary to examine your login activities on the application.
If you noticed suspicious activity on your account, let us know what"'"s going on and we will help you.
Your mail has been successfully sent. If you found any other problems, feel free to contact us at any time.
Login with App Tiebreak Tennis Academy
Sign up with App Tiebreak Tennis Academy
You can find more privacy settings on App Tiebreak Tennis Academy in settings.
We"'"ll help you make the right decisions for your account settings.
Which section do you want \n to start with ?
Who can see what you book
How you can be found on App Tiebreak Tennis Academy
Your data settings on App Tiebreak Tennis Academy
Our application is well secured. No one can see your personal information or your activities on the apps. Reservation activities are also private.

We advise you to secure your account by providing a very strong password. Password length must be 5 or greater. In addition, the password must contain a number, an uppercase letter and a lowercase letter.
Other members cannot currently find you. This feature will be available soon. Mobile phone numbers, email address and WhatsApp number must be provided for the data requested from the app.
Your personal data is well secured. No one can see them. Our mobile app connects with facebook, google and email apps. It does not use your geographic location.

Mastercoach Kelly or Killer Kelly as he has been known by anyone who has had the influence of Jarred on their tennis. As soon as you step on the court he makes your believe that you could acutally win Wimbeldon one day. This exuberance never falters with jarreds coaching style. He is 100% committed to getting the best out of every single player no matter what age or ability they are.

Kieron was born in Western Australia and while in primary school he travelled all around Australia with his parents where he was home schooled. They came to visit family in the Coffs Coast 5 years ago and ended up settling here, with Kieron attending Bellingen High School. Kieron started to play tennis with Jarred in Bellingen during high school where they connected. Under Jarred"'"s counsel Kieron is currently putting the wheels in motion to train as a Level 1 Tennis Australia Coach and is very excited about a long-term future with Tiebreak Tennis. Kieron considers Jarred a role model who has had a huge influence on him, particularly Jarred"'"s ability to talk people out of negative thoughts. For the moment Kieron is enjoying coaching and developing his own practice at Tiebreak Tennis and is about to hit the Mid North Coast Tennis Tournament circuit with multiple tournaments lined up over the next few months.

Mal is currently taking a year off his University Degree, Agricultural Science, to take some time to decide what direction he is going to take in the future. Mal came to Coffs Harbour just before High School as a refugee from Burma and attended John Paul College for his High school years. At the time Mal was playing tennis elsewhere but came along one night with his friends and was instantly seduced by Jarred"'"s dynamic and inspiring coaching methods and well the rest is history. Mal spends part of his time at Tiebreak Tennis assisting with the admin and as a support coach during classes and tennis clinics. While at the same time spends much of his time volunteering with Lifeline helping newly arrived refugees and with local Aged Care services.
View and edit profile securely with just one click.
Easily configure your mobile application according to your needs.
Tiebreak Tennis has 9 courts in total. 3 are ready and 6 are currently under construction to be the only 6 clay courts in the area.
Book a court on the date and at the desired time to train with a coach in a pleasant environment.
Each coach is assigned to a court according to our computer system and the availability of the courts.
Please identify the date of the tennis court reservation to confirm your reservation.
Please enter the start date and end date of your courts reservation so that we can validate and confirm your reservation.
The date of booking is required !
The start time of booking is required !
The end time of booking is required !
Your end time is entered incorrectly !
Sorry ! another player has created a booking in this time slot. Please choose another duration and try again later.
Your court booking with the information entered has been successfully created. You can consult the details of your booking at any time via the booking list tab.
